td.content: s:50 yr old female with mild deterioration of eye sight, mild problem with seeing at night and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. she has had several such episodes over past 3 years. Patient does not smoke she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 154 cm, Weight 94.8 kg, Temperature 37.4 C, Pulse 67, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.

td.content: s:a female motivational speaker aged 51 yrs presents with 3 years history of severe frequent urination, severe b/l foot pain and moderate lethargy. o:Height 154 cm, Weight 92.7 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 66, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, rectal exam = normal, no masses found, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OU:20/100, normal pupillary reflex, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity, appears in NAD, appropriate speech, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, Extremities = B/L 2+ pitting edema throughout a:Type 1 Diabetes p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to endocrinology.
